verses.verse: וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came בָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> And it came to pass at that time הַהִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> he וַיֵּ֥רֶד <S%H3381><s%> went down יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> that Judah מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> אֶחָ֑יו <S%H251><s%> from his brethren וַיֵּ֛ט <S%H5186><s%> and turned עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> in to a certain עֲדֻלָּמִ֖י <S%H5726><s%> Adullamite וּשְׁמ֥וֹ <S%H8034><s%> whose name חִירָֽה׃ <S%H2437><s%> [was] Hirah

וַיַּרְא־ <S%H7200><s%> saw שָׁ֧ם <S%H8033><s%> there יְהוּדָ֛ה <S%H3063><s%> And Judah בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> there a daughter אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of a certain כְּנַעֲנִ֖י <S%H3669><s%> Canaanite וּשְׁמ֣וֹ <S%H8034><s%> whose name שׁ֑וּעַ <S%H7770><s%> [was] Shuah וַיִּקָּחֶ֖הָ <S%H3947><s%> and he took her וַיָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> and went in אֵלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וַתַּ֖הַר <S%H2029><s%> And she conceived וַתֵּ֣לֶד <S%H3205><s%> and bare בֵּ֑ן <S%H1121><s%> a son וַיִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> and he called אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name עֵֽר׃ <S%H6147><s%> Er

וַתַּ֥הַר <S%H2029><s%> And she conceived ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again וַתֵּ֣לֶד <S%H3205><s%> again and bare בֵּ֑ן <S%H1121><s%> a son וַתִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> and she called אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name אוֹנָֽן׃ <S%H209><s%> Onan

וַתֹּ֤סֶף <S%H3254><s%> And she yet again conceived עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> still וַתֵּ֣לֶד <S%H3205><s%> and bare בֵּ֔ן <S%H1121><s%> a son וַתִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> and called אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name שֵׁלָ֑ה <S%H7956><s%> Shelah וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become בִכְזִ֖יב <S%H3580><s%> and he was at Chezib בְּלִדְתָּ֥הּ <S%H3205><s%> when she bare אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%>

וַיִּקַּ֧ח <S%H3947><s%> took יְהוּדָ֛ה <S%H3063><s%> And Judah אִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> a wife לְעֵ֣ר <S%H6147><s%> for Er בְּכוֹר֑וֹ <S%H1060><s%> his firstborn וּשְׁמָ֖הּ <S%H8034><s%> whose name תָּמָֽר׃ <S%H8559><s%> [was] Tamar

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> become עֵ֚ר <S%H6147><s%> And Er בְּכ֣וֹר <S%H1060><s%> firstborn יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah's רַ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> was wicked בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיְמִתֵ֖הוּ <S%H4191><s%> slew יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> And Judah לְאוֹנָ֔ן <S%H209><s%> unto Onan בֹּ֛א <S%H935><s%> Go in אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֵ֥שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> wife אָחִ֖יךָ <S%H251><s%> unto thy brother's וְיַבֵּ֣ם <S%H2992><s%> and marry אֹתָ֑הּ <S%H853><s%> וְהָקֵ֥ם <S%H6965><s%> her and raise up זֶ֖רַע <S%H2233><s%> seed לְאָחִֽיךָ׃ <S%H251><s%> to thy brother

וַיֵּ֣דַע <S%H3045><s%> knew אוֹנָ֔ן <S%H209><s%> And Onan כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹּ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not ל֖וֹ יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become הַזָּ֑רַע <S%H2233><s%> that the seed וְהָיָ֞ה <S%H1961><s%> not be his so אִם־ <S%H518><s%> should not be his and it came to pass when בָּ֨א <S%H935><s%> he went in אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֵ֤שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> wife אָחִיו֙ <S%H251><s%> unto his brother's וְשִׁחֵ֣ת <S%H7843><s%> that he spilled אַ֔רְצָה <S%H776><s%> [it] on the ground לְבִלְתִּ֥י <S%H1115><s%> lest נְתָן־ <S%H5414><s%> that he should give זֶ֖רַע <S%H2233><s%> seed לְאָחִֽיו׃ <S%H251><s%> to his brother

וַיֵּ֛רַע <S%H7489><s%> was displeasing בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> the sight יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> And the thing which עָשָׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> he did וַיָּ֖מֶת <S%H4191><s%> wherefore he slew גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%>

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said יְהוּדָה֩ <S%H3063><s%> Judah לְתָמָ֨ר <S%H8559><s%> to Tamar כַּלָּת֜וֹ <S%H3618><s%> his daughter in law שְׁבִ֧י <S%H3427><s%> Remain אַלְמָנָ֣ה <S%H490><s%> a widow בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> house אָבִ֗יךְ <S%H1><s%> at thy father's עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until יִגְדַּל֙ <S%H1431><s%> be grown שֵׁלָ֣ה <S%H7956><s%> till Shelah בְנִ֔י <S%H1121><s%> my son כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אָמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> for he said פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> lest יָמ֥וּת <S%H4191><s%> Lest peradventure he die גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> too ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he כְּאֶחָ֑יו <S%H251><s%> also as his brethren וַתֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went תָּמָ֔ר <S%H8559><s%> [did] And Tamar וַתֵּ֖שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> and dwelt בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> house אָבִֽיהָ׃ <S%H1><s%> in her father's

וַיִּרְבּוּ֙ <S%H7235><s%> And in process הַיָּמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> of time וַתָּ֖מָת <S%H4191><s%> died בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter שׁ֣וּעַ <S%H7770><s%> of Shuah אֵֽשֶׁת־ <S%H802><s%> wife יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah's וַיִּנָּ֣חֶם <S%H5162><s%> was comforted יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> and Judah וַיַּ֜עַל <S%H5927><s%> and went up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and גֹּֽזֲזֵ֤י <S%H1494><s%> cut off צֹאנוֹ֙ <S%H6629><s%> cattle ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְחִירָ֛ה <S%H2437><s%> Hirah רֵעֵ֥הוּ <S%H7453><s%> he and his friend הָעֲדֻלָּמִ֖י <S%H5726><s%> the Adullamite תִּמְנָֽתָה׃ <S%H8553><s%> to Timnath

וַיֻּגַּ֥ד <S%H5046><s%> And it was told לְתָמָ֖ר <S%H8559><s%> Tamar לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold חָמִ֛יךְ <S%H2524><s%> Behold thy father in law עֹלֶ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> goeth up תִמְנָ֖תָה <S%H8553><s%> to Timnath לָגֹ֥ז <S%H1494><s%> to shear צֹאנֽוֹ׃ <S%H6629><s%> his sheep

וַתָּסַר֩ <S%H5493><s%> off בִּגְדֵ֨י <S%H899><s%> garments אַלְמְנוּתָ֜הּ <S%H491><s%> her widow's מֵֽעָלֶ֗יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and וַתְּכַ֤ס <S%H3680><s%> from her and covered her בַּצָּעִיף֙ <S%H6809><s%> with a vail וַתִּתְעַלָּ֔ף <S%H5968><s%> and wrapped herself וַתֵּ֙שֶׁב֙ <S%H3427><s%> and sat in בְּפֶ֣תַח <S%H6607><s%> place עֵינַ֔יִם <S%H5869><s%> an open אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is on דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> which [is] by the way תִּמְנָ֑תָה <S%H8553><s%> to Timnath כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for רָאֲתָה֙ <S%H7200><s%> for she saw כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for גָדַ֣ל <S%H1431><s%> was grown שֵׁלָ֔ה <S%H7956><s%> that Shelah וְהִ֕וא <S%H1931><s%> he לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> had not נִתְּנָ֥ה <S%H5414><s%> and she was not given ל֖וֹ לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> unto him to wife

וַיִּרְאֶ֣הָ <S%H7200><s%> saw her יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> When Judah וַֽיַּחְשְׁבֶ֖הָ <S%H2803><s%> he thought לְזוֹנָ֑ה <S%H2181><s%> her [to be] an harlot כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for כִסְּתָ֖ה <S%H3680><s%> because she had covered פָּנֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H6440><s%> her face

וַיֵּ֨ט <S%H5186><s%> And he turned אֵלֶ֜יהָ <S%H413><s%> about אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to her הַדֶּ֗רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> unto her by the way וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> and said הָֽבָה־ <S%H3051><s%> Go to נָּא֙ <S%H4994><s%> now אָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> I pray thee let me come in אֵלַ֔יִךְ <S%H413><s%> about כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not יָדַ֔ע <S%H3045><s%> unto thee (for he knew כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for כַלָּת֖וֹ <S%H3618><s%> was his daughter-in-law הִ֑וא <S%H1931><s%> and she וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> said מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What תִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> What wilt thou give לִּ֔י כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> that תָב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> me that thou mayest come in אֵלָֽי׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אָנֹכִ֛י <S%H595><s%> I אֲשַׁלַּ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> I will send גְּדִֽי־ <S%H1423><s%> kid עִזִּ֖ים <S%H5795><s%> goat מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַצֹּ֑אן <S%H6629><s%> from the flock וַתֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And she said אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo תִּתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> Wilt thou give עֵרָב֖וֹן <S%H6162><s%> [me] a pledge עַ֥ד <S%H5704><s%> until שָׁלְחֶֽךָ׃ <S%H7971><s%> till thou send

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said מָ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> What הָֽעֵרָבוֹן֮ <S%H6162><s%> pledge אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> What אֶתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> shall I give לָּךְ֒ וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> thee? And she said חֹתָֽמְךָ֙ <S%H2368><s%> Thy signet וּפְתִילֶ֔ךָ <S%H6616><s%> and thy bracelets וּמַטְּךָ֖ <S%H4294><s%> and thy staff אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> is in בְּיָדֶ֑ךָ <S%H3027><s%> that [is] in thine hand וַיִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> And he gave לָּ֛הּ וַיָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> [it] her and came in אֵלֶ֖יהָ <S%H413><s%> to וַתַּ֥הַר <S%H2029><s%> unto her and she conceived לֽוֹ׃

וַתָּ֣קָם <S%H6965><s%> And she arose וַתֵּ֔לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and departed וַתָּ֥סַר <S%H5493><s%> and laid by צְעִיפָ֖הּ <S%H6809><s%> her vail מֵעָלֶ֑יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and וַתִּלְבַּ֖שׁ <S%H3847><s%> from her and put on בִּגְדֵ֥י <S%H899><s%> the garments אַלְמְנוּתָֽהּ׃ <S%H491><s%> of her widowhood

וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <S%H7971><s%> sent יְהוּדָ֜ה <S%H3063><s%> And Judah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גְּדִ֣י <S%H1423><s%> kid הָֽעִזִּ֗ים <S%H5795><s%> goat בְּיַד֙ <S%H3027><s%> by the hand רֵעֵ֣הוּ <S%H7453><s%> of his friend הָֽעֲדֻלָּמִ֔י <S%H5726><s%> the Adullamite לָקַ֥חַת <S%H3947><s%> to receive הָעֵרָב֖וֹן <S%H6162><s%> [his] pledge מִיַּ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> hand הָאִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> from the woman's וְלֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> did not מְצָאָֽהּ׃ <S%H4672><s%> but he found her

וַיִּשְׁאַ֞ל <S%H7592><s%> Then he asked אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַנְשֵׁ֤י <S%H582><s%> the men מְקֹמָהּ֙ <S%H4725><s%> of that place לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying אַיֵּ֧ה <S%H346><s%> Where הַקְּדֵשָׁ֛ה <S%H6948><s%> Where [is] the harlot הִ֥וא <S%H1931><s%> who בָעֵינַ֖יִם <S%H5879><s%> Enaim עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> was by הַדָּ֑רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> the road וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> saying לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no הָיְתָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> has been בָזֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> in this קְדֵשָֽׁה׃ <S%H6948><s%> There was no harlot

וַיָּ֙שָׁב֙ <S%H7725><s%> And he returned אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> to Judah וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> I cannot מְצָאתִ֑יהָ <S%H4672><s%> find וְגַ֨ם <S%H1571><s%> her and furthermore אַנְשֵׁ֤י <S%H376><s%> the men הַמָּקוֹם֙ <S%H4725><s%> of the place אָֽמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> said לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no הָיְתָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> has been בָזֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> no קְדֵשָֽׁה׃ <S%H6948><s%> [that] there was no harlot

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> And Judah תִּֽקַּֽח־ <S%H3947><s%> Let her take לָ֔הּ פֶּ֖ן <S%H6435><s%> otherwise נִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> will become לָב֑וּז <S%H937><s%> [it] to her lest we be shamed הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> After שָׁלַ֙חְתִּי֙ <S%H7971><s%> behold I sent הַגְּדִ֣י <S%H1423><s%> this kid הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this וְאַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not מְצָאתָֽהּ׃ <S%H4672><s%> and thou hast not found

וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <S%H1961><s%> become כְּמִשְׁלֹ֣שׁ <S%H7969><s%> And it came to pass about three חֳדָשִׁ֗ים <S%H2320><s%> months וַיֻּגַּ֨ד <S%H5046><s%> after that it was told לִֽיהוּדָ֤ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah לֵֽאמֹר֙ <S%H559><s%> saying זָֽנְתָה֙ <S%H2181><s%> hath played the harlot תָּמָ֣ר <S%H8559><s%> Tamar כַּלָּתֶ֔ךָ <S%H3618><s%> thy daughter in law וְגַ֛ם <S%H1571><s%> is also הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold הָרָ֖ה <S%H2030><s%> and also behold she [is] with child לִזְנוּנִ֑ים <S%H2183><s%> by whoredom וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> And Judah הוֹצִיא֖וּהָ <S%H3318><s%> Bring her forth וְתִשָּׂרֵֽף׃ <S%H8313><s%> and let her be burnt

הִ֣וא <S%H1931><s%> he מוּצֵ֗את <S%H3318><s%> When she [was] brought forth וְהִ֨יא <S%H1931><s%> she שָׁלְחָ֤ה <S%H7971><s%> she sent אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to her חָמִ֙יהָ֙ <S%H2524><s%> to her father in law לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying לְאִישׁ֙ <S%H582><s%> another אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> to whom אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these לּ֔וֹ אָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> I הָרָ֑ה <S%H2030><s%> whose these [are am] I with child וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> and she said הַכֶּר־ <S%H5234><s%> Discern נָ֔א <S%H4994><s%> Please לְמִ֞י <S%H4310><s%> whose הַחֹתֶ֧מֶת <S%H2858><s%> I pray thee whose [are] these the signet וְהַפְּתִילִ֛ים <S%H6616><s%> and bracelets וְהַמַּטֶּ֖ה <S%H4294><s%> and staff הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> things

וַיַּכֵּ֣ר <S%H5234><s%> acknowledged יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> And Judah וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> [them] and said צָֽדְקָ֣ה <S%H6663><s%> She hath been more righteous מִמֶּ֔נִּי <S%H4480><s%> is more כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> after that לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not נְתַתִּ֖יהָ <S%H5414><s%> than I because that I gave לְשֵׁלָ֣ה <S%H7956><s%> her not to Shelah בְנִ֑י <S%H1121><s%> my son וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יָסַ֥ף <S%H3254><s%> again ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again לְדַעְתָּֽה׃ <S%H3045><s%> And he knew her

וַיְהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> came בְּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> And it came to pass in the time לִדְתָּ֑הּ <S%H3205><s%> of her travail וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> behold תְאוֹמִ֖ים <S%H8380><s%> that behold twins בְּבִטְנָֽהּ׃ <S%H990><s%> [were] in her womb

וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> took בְלִדְתָּ֖הּ <S%H3205><s%> And it came to pass when she travailed וַיִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> that [the one] put out יָ֑ד <S%H3027><s%> [his] hand וַתִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> took הַמְיַלֶּ֗דֶת <S%H3205><s%> and the midwife וַתִּקְשֹׁ֨ר <S%H7194><s%> and bound עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on יָד֤וֹ <S%H3027><s%> upon his hand שָׁנִי֙ <S%H8144><s%> a scarlet thread לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying זֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> This יָצָ֥א <S%H3318><s%> This came out רִאשֹׁנָֽה׃ <S%H7223><s%> first

וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <S%H1961><s%> came כְּמֵשִׁ֣יב <S%H7725><s%> And it came to pass as he drew back יָד֗וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand וְהִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> behold יָצָ֣א <S%H3318><s%> came out אָחִ֔יו <S%H251><s%> that behold his brother וַתֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and she said מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What פָּרַ֖צְתָּ <S%H6555><s%> How hast thou broken forth עָלֶ֣יךָ <S%H5921><s%> and פָּ֑רֶץ <S%H6556><s%> ? [this] breach וַיִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> was called שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> [be] upon thee therefore his name פָּֽרֶץ׃ <S%H6557><s%> Pharez

וְאַחַר֙ <S%H310><s%> And afterward יָצָ֣א <S%H3318><s%> came out אָחִ֔יו <S%H251><s%> his brother אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on יָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> upon his hand הַשָּׁנִ֑י <S%H8144><s%> that had the scarlet thread וַיִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> was called שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> and his name זָֽרַח׃ <S%H2226><s%> Zarah ס
